00019 #ifndef _COPPERPLATE_SEMOBJ_H
00020 #define _COPPERPLATE_SEMOBJ_H
00021 
00022 #include <copperplate/reference.h>
00023 
00024 #ifdef CONFIG_XENO_COBALT
00025 
00026 #include <semaphore.h>
00027 
00028 struct semobj_corespec {
00029         sem_t sem;
00030 };
00031 
00032 #else  /* CONFIG_XENO_MERCURY */
00033 
00034 #include <copperplate/syncobj.h>
00035 
00036 struct semobj_corespec {
00037         struct syncobj sobj;
00038         int flags;
00039         int value;
00040 };
00041 
00042 #endif /* CONFIG_XENO_MERCURY */
00043 
00044 struct semobj {
00045         struct semobj_corespec core;
00046         fnref_type(void (*)(struct semobj *smobj)) finalizer;
00047 };
00048 
00049 #define SEMOBJ_PRIO     0x1
00050 #define SEMOBJ_PULSE    0x2
00051 #define SEMOBJ_WARNDEL  0x4
00052 
00053 #ifdef __cplusplus
00054 extern "C" {
00055 #endif
00056 
00057 int semobj_init(struct semobj *smobj,
00058                 int flags, int value,
00059                 fnref_type(void (*)(struct semobj *smobj)) finalizer);
00060 
00061 int semobj_destroy(struct semobj *smobj);
00062 
00063 int semobj_post(struct semobj *smobj);
00064 
00065 int semobj_broadcast(struct semobj *smobj);
00066 
00067 int semobj_wait(struct semobj *smobj,
00068                 const struct timespec *timeout);
00069 
00070 int semobj_getvalue(struct semobj *smobj, int *sval);
00071 
00072 #ifdef __cplusplus
00073 }
00074 #endif
00075 
00076 #endif /* _COPPERPLATE_SEMOBJ_H */
